name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C)
Roll out pizza dough on floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough
Add torn mozzarella pieces
Drizzle with olive oil and season
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden
Top with fresh basil before serving

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes
Cook marinated chicken until golden
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger
Add tomato puree and spices
Simmer and add cooked chicken
Stir in cream and simmer for 10 minutes
Serve with rice or naan

name: Mediterranean Bowl
description: Fresh and healthy bowl with quinoa, vegetables, and tahini dressing
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces
Mix tahini, lemon juice, and olive oil for dressing
Arrange quinoa in bowls
Top with vegetables and feta
Drizzle with tahini dressing
Serve immediately

name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy American-style pancakes perfect for weekend mornings
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Whisk wet ingredients in separate bowl
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Heat griddle or pan over medium heat
Pour batter to form pancakes
Cook until bubbles form, then flip
Serve hot with maple syrup

name: Thai Green Curry
description: Aromatic Thai curry with chicken and vegetables in coconut milk
instructions: Heat coconut milk in a wok
Add curry paste and cook until fragrant
Add chicken and cook until done
Add vegetables and remaining coconut milk
Season with fish sauce and sugar
Simmer until vegetables are tender
Garnish with Thai basil and serve with rice

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with classic Caesar dressing and croutons
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Make dressing with mayo, lemon, garlic, and anchovy
Add Worcestershire sauce and pepper
Toss lettuce with dressing
Top with Parmesan and croutons
Serve immediately
